body_content.explanation: an adaptation (= a slight change to a living thing that happens over time so it can continue to exist in a particular environment) as a reaction to an adaptation by another living thing in the same environment :
examples: Behavioural change may reflect a counter-adaptation by the host in response to a parasite.

body_content.explanation: the process in which a living thing adapts (= changes slightly over time to be able to continue to exist in a particular environment) as a reaction to another living thing in the same environment adapting:
examples: As time goes on, some of the invading species' population may be eliminated by counter-adaptation.
